name: vainjs-raycast
title: @vainjs
description: Search and open projects from your workspace folders. Compatible with your favorite code editors and shows git branch info.
author: young

commands.name: open-project
commands.title: Search and Open Project
commands.description: Search and open projects from your workspace in your preferred editor.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
